author: Kim Lyons
title: Instacart workers will walk out on Monday for better sick leave and virus protections
description: Instacart shoppers are planning a walkout Monday because they say the grocery delivery company has not done enough to ensure their safety during the coronavirus outbreak. The workers will refuse to accept new orders through the Instacart app until the company…
content:
People are doing this literally to save their lives, says organizer
An Instacart shopper walks past empty shelves at a supermarket in California on March 19th.
Photo by FREDERIC J. BROWN/AFP via Getty Images
Instacart shoppers are organizing a work stoppag… [+4152 chars]
